sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"laravel-4-basics"}}>{`LARAVEL 4 BASICS`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getting-started-with-laravel"}}>{`Getting Started with Laravel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"installing-virtualbox-homestead--vagrant"}}>{`Installing VirtualBox, Homestead & Vagrant`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Download VirtualBox for your OS from their website`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Download Vagrant for your OS from their website`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Use a command to install install Homestead`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vagrant box add laravel/homestead`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In a shell, check that you have SSH.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`cd ~
ls -la
# check for .ssh
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If not, you can generate a key.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In terminal:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail@email.com".
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`There is also a great guide on GitHub.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://help.github.com/articles/generating-an-ssh-key/"}}>{`https://help.github.com/articles/generating-an-ssh-key/`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{` Init the Homestead.yaml file `}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`bash init.sh`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In ~/Homestead, alter the Homestead.yaml file.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Replace "me" with the User`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Under "folders" where it has the map and to, change the to direction to have .../Sites if you don't want the default and to follow along with TH.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Sites we can change to anything. Eg. laravel.dev`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Ensure sites is okay too and that the Sites/`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`<here>`}</MDXTag>{`/`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`<here>`}</MDXTag>{` is laravel-basics/public`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Run the Vagrant Up command in terminal `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vagrant up`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If there is a host issue, change the Homestead.yaml host.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{` Getting into the box `}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Connect via SSH`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vagrant ssh`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"install-laravel"}}>{`Install Laravel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Ensure composer is installed on your external SSH OS.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`composer global require "laravel/installer"`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{` Composer Create-Project `}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel laravel-basics
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Alternatively...`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`laravel new laravel-basics
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Note`}</MDXTag>{` laravel-basics can be swapped for anything.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Run pwd and check this against what you have in ~/.homestead/Homestead.yaml`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Then jump to the site (127.0.0.1:8000) to see if it is running successfully.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To get rid of the 127.0.0.1, we can change it to another host.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`cd /etc from the Homestead file and adjust the hosts file in a text editor to make the website easier to navigate to.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"laravel-folder-structure"}}>{`Laravel Folder Structure`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"project-setup"}}>{`Project Setup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"laravel-controllers"}}>{`Laravel Controllers`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"laravel-and-databases"}}>{`Laravel and Databases`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"blade-and-forms"}}>{`Blade and Forms`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"validation--flash-messages"}}>{`Validation & Flash Messages`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"continuing-crud"}}>{`Continuing CRUD`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"relating-data"}}>{`Relating Data`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
